gramGrp.pos:
REPORT VB
or
VB
with
OBJ
and
TO-INF

sense.def:
To assume that something is true
pomeni sklepati, da je nekaj res, včasih tudi zmotno.

seg.quote: I was mistakenly assumed to be a Welshman.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
assumes power or responsibility
, začenja imeti vpliv ali odgovornost.

To assume a particular expression, quality, or way of behaving
pomeni, da smo od takrat videti ali se vedemo tako.
